title: Heera Kundanalu: Polki Diamond Cascade Earrings
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (approx. 3 carats total weight)
features: A mesmerizing cascade design featuring three graduating Polki diamond clusters. Each diamond is individually bezel-set in 22K gold with a textured 'sunflower' halo, reminiscent of traditional nakshi work. The earring posts are designed for comfortable wear, ensuring secure and graceful movement.
colors: Warm gold tones with the natural
milky white of the Polki diamonds. The contrast creates a sophisticated and timeless appeal.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. These earrings add a touch of regal elegance to any traditional South Indian attire like a Kanjeevaram saree or a modern Indo-Western ensemble.
description: This pair of Kundanalu epitomizes Hyderabadi craftsmanship, blending traditional techniques with contemporary design. The use of uncut Polki diamonds, a hallmark of Indian jewelry, lends an heirloom quality and a unique sparkle. The design ensures comfortable wear while making a stunning statement. A true investment piece that transcends trends.
